title: Children's Accessibility Needs Require Specific Consideration
summary: We will given an update on the group's work and share the 6 main reasons that children with disabilities will benefit from specific consideration in next-generation accessibility standards.
type: 30-minute talk followed by 30 minutes for discussion
goals: Provide an update on the work and goals of the Accessibility for Children Community Group, which has been active for about a year.
Share the 6 main reasons that children with disabilities will benefit from specific consideration in next-generation accessibility standards.
Share the main topics and success indicators that we will be exploring and refining in the group's full white paper.
